com.lge.qcircle.template

Class QCircleTitle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lge.qcircle.template.QCircleTitle

  • public final class QCircleTitle
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents title views of QuickCircle.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QCircleTitle(Context context, java.lang.String title)
      creates a title bar with a text.
      QCircleTitle(Context context, java.lang.String title, int titleTextColor, int backgroundColor)
      creates a title bar with a text.
      QCircleTitle(Context context, View title)
      creates a title bar with the given View.
      QCircleTitle(Context context, View title, int backgroundColor)
      creates a title bar with the given View.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • QCircleTitle

        public QCircleTitle(Context context,
            java.lang.String title)
        creates a title bar with a text.

        It makes a android.widget.TextView with the given text.

        Parameters:
        title - title text for the title.
        If it is null, no title text will be shown but the title bar will occupy some space.
        context - Activity which has a circle view.
        If it is null, you might get errors when you use method of this class.

      • QCircleTitle

        public QCircleTitle(Context context,
            java.lang.String title,
            int titleTextColor,
            int backgroundColor)
        creates a title bar with a text.

        It makes a android.widget.TextView with the given text.

        Parameters:
        title - title text for the title.
        If it is null, no title text will be shown but the title bar will occupy some space.
        context - Activity which has a circle view.
        If it is null, you might get errors when you use method of this class.
        titleTextColor - The color of the title
        backgroundColor - The background color of the title

      • QCircleTitle

        public QCircleTitle(Context context,
            View title)
        creates a title bar with the given View.
        Parameters:
        context - Activity which has a circle view.
        If it is null, you might get errors when you use method of this class.
        title - View for the title bar.
        If it is null, a empty title bar will be created.

      • QCircleTitle

        public QCircleTitle(Context context,
            View title,
            int backgroundColor)
        creates a title bar with the given View.
        Parameters:
        context - Activity which has a circle view.
        If it is null, you might get errors when you use method of this class.
        title - View for the title bar.
        If it is null, a empty title bar will be created.
        backgroundColor - The background color of the title

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public int getId()
        gets the ID of the title view.
        Returns:
        ID of the title view

      • getView

        public View getView()
        gets the view of the title.
        Returns:
        root of the title view

      • setTextSize

        public void setTextSize(float size)
        sets the font size of the title text.
        Parameters:
        size - font size in pixel.
        If it is less or equal to 0, the font size will not change.

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
        sets the text of the title view.
        Parameters:
        title - title text for the title.
        If it is null, no title text will be shown but the title bar will occupy some space.

      • setView

        public boolean setView(View view)
        sets the view of the title.
        Parameters:
        view - View for title
        Returns:
        true if the title view is added successfully or
        false otherwise.
